name: Bag Boy Memory
description:
Bag Boy Memory is a recreation of the classic memory minigame from Sonic Advance's Tiny Chao Garden. It's my first project for Playdate, mainly meant for me to familiarise myself with the SDK.

There is a known bug where the music occasionally cuts out for no apparent reason until the next game starts. I have no idea what could possibly be causing this; I hope I can look into it at some point in the future.
